title: Reimagined Amsterdam Heritage City Break in Old Centre with Daily Breakfast & Daily Dining Credit
description:
Housed within a collection of interconnected 17th-century townhouses and a 15th-century chapel, this architectural gem in the Old Centre of Amsterdam tastefully blends heritage with modern elegance. Complete with its own boating dock for canal tours, the hotel brings Amsterdam's unique charm right to your doorstep.

Take in the property's captivating interiors, boasting exposed wooden beams, high ceilings and details from the past, then indulge in European fare at Restaurant Vermeer and exquisite drops at Bar Bottles & Jar before venturing into the city.

Just moments from Amsterdam's world-renowned canals, uniquely tall townhouses and thriving spirit, you could not be better placed to immerse yourself in this radiant metropolis. Back at the hotel, enjoy moments of bliss at the onsite spa after busy days of exploring.

title: Modern Amsterdam City Escape in Museum District
description:
Within the city of Amsterdam lies a plethora of trendy neighbourhoods packed with things to see and do - and a stay at Max Brown Museum Square places you in the centre of the museum district.

Set minutes away from the famous Vondelpark, this bustling pocket offers no shortage of things to see and do. Saunter along P.C. Hooftstraat shopping street, fill your afternoon at the nearby Rijksmuseum and Van Gogh Museum or do as the locals do and trace canal-lined core on two-wheels. At the end of each day, retreat to your bright and airy, stylish room housed within one of four traditional Amsterdam townhouses to relax and unwind or take a seat at the 24-hour bar on site.

title: Trendy Amsterdam Escape Overlooking the Canals
description:
The quirky and vibrant essence of Amsterdam is expertly distilled through every corner of Max Brown Canal District - a stylish hotel spread across three historical houses, set upon the intersection of the city’s most iconic canals.

Step out of the hotel and onto Milkmaid's Bridge to explore plenty of revered sights nearby, including the Anne Frank House, buzzing restaurants, bars and shopping spots. Ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, the hotel offers contemporary interiors, worlds apart from its historic exterior, including modern accents, rich textures and pieces by local artists. The floor-to-ceiling book wall in the lobby will immediately capture your attention. When you want to unwind, the peaceful inner garden terrace is the ideal spot to curl up with a book and a drink from the honesty fridge or a board game from the communal stash.

title: Boutique Riverfront Amsterdam Escape in A’DAM Tower with 360-Degree Observation Deck
description:
Gravitate to Amsterdam's mecca for music and design with a boutique stay at Sir Adam, a contemporary hotel housed in one of the city's most iconic riverside buildings, the A'DAM Tower, home to a spectacular 360-degree observation deck.

Surrounded by a medley of iconic music HQs, including MassiveMusic, Sony Music and Wink, this striking tower flourishes with creativity and is also home to several top-notch restaurants and bars, a vibrant nightclub, and the design-driven hotel, Sir Adam, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Stretch out in rooms featuring avant-garde artwork and luxe amenities inviting you to draw out your inner muso: strum on the electric guitar, spin your favourite tunes on the record player, or meet with new friends in the communal music library, a space for like-minded creatives to relax and mingle. Hop across the river on a three-minute ferry and you'll find yourself at Amsterdam Central Station. From here, it's just 10-minutes to Dam Square, 20-minutes to Anne Frank House or take a 15-minute train to Van Gogh Museum.

title: Award-Winning Heritage Escape in the Heart of Amsterdam
description: For a dose of culture and history, there’s no better place to base yourself than Park Centraal Amsterdam, a grand 160-year-old heritage hotel in the heart of the Netherlands' capital. Spend your time exploring the canal-lined streets and weaving in and out of museums, vintage shops, bars and enchanting gardens. Return to your hotel - recipient of a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Best of the Best 2021 award, placing it among the top 1% worldwide on the review site - and order a drink at Bar Claes, a sultry space serving up classic cocktails. Feast on mouthwatering Asian-fusion bites at the upscale MOMO restaurant and play a round of billiards in the funky lounge.

title: Amsterdam Chinatown Art-Inspired Canal-Side Escape
description:
Experience the canal-woven beauty and lively atmosphere of Amsterdam at the boutique Hotel Mai. Inspired by its Chinatown location - the name stands for Meet Asia in Amsterdam - this unique hotel marries Asian influences with an unbeatable central location and beautiful canal views. While your days away crisscrossing over the labyrinthine bridges and waterways brimming with colourful flowers and boutiques, getting lost in the bustling Nieuwmarkt, visiting the ever-popular De Wallen district and discovering Dam Square, your gateway to the Anne Frank House, Van Gogh Museum and Rijksmuseum.

After a day of exploration, retreat to the boutique Hotel Mai, where you’ll be surrounded by eclectic style, with world-class art gracing the walls, unique lamps and statements pieces, and breathtaking canal views every local wishes they could wake up to.

vendor_name: Pillows Luxury Boutique Hotel Anna Van Den Vondel, Amsterdam
title: Award-Winning Romantic Amsterdam Stay with Daily Breakfast
description:
Fall in love with the arresting beauty of Amsterdam staying in award-winning luxury at Pillows Luxury Boutique Hotel Anna Van Den Vondel. Named among the Top 25 Hotels for Romance in the Netherlands at the 2020 Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice Best of the Best awards - honouring the top 1% of properties worldwide - this is a romantic escape in one of the most beautiful locations in the city. 

Set in an elegant 19th-century mansion overlooking the leafy Vondelpark, this boutique hotel invites you to feel right at home with its calming colour palette, minimalist design and velvet touches. The Living restaurant invites you to sit back and indulge in small dishes, sharing platters and fine wines. If you can leave the comfort of your boutique room behind, Amsterdam's most popular sights - including the beautiful Rijksmuseum, Rembrandt and Van Gogh museums - and the city’s picturesque canals are all within easy reach of your city retreat.
location_description: Pillows Luxury Boutique Hotel Anna Van Den Vondel
offer_address: Anna van Den Vondelstraat 6, 1054 GZ Amsterdam, Netherlands

title: Amsterdam Artsy Jordaan Escape
description:
Immerse yourself in the picturesque beauty and lively atmosphere of Amsterdam, staying in one of the city’s most iconic neighbourhoods - ultra-cool Jordaan - at the boutique Hotel Mercier. Push open the hotel’s doors and embrace the hip vibes of Jordaan, famous for its narrow canals and cobbled streets filled with trendy boutiques, antique shops, fine-dining restaurants and cosy cafés. You'll be perfectly placed to explore Amsterdam’s most popular sights, including the beautiful Rijksmuseum, dreamy Vondelpark, the Rembrandt and Vang Gogh museums, and the city’s picturesque canals, brimming with colourful flowers and pretty shops.

When you are done exploring, retreat to the glamorous Hotel Mercier, where you’ll find beautifully designed rooms with bespoke furniture and antique touches, an elegant restaurant and bar, and outstanding hospitality.

title: Music-Inspired Hard Rock Escape in the Heart of Amsterdam
description:
Appeal to your inner rockstar and live a bold-faced, carefree lifestyle in the centre of it all at Hard Rock Hotel Amsterdam American. Situated in the heart of the city at the vibrant Leidseplein square, this 1900s Art Nouveau-style building opened in 2020 and has kept most of its vintage features intact, from stained-glass windows to paintings on the interior walls. Within easy reach you'll find a plethora of bars and restaurants plus key attractions including the Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, Grachtenmuseum and Vondelpark.

Refreshingly innovative, Hard Rock Hotel Amsterdam American is a glittering oasis for visitors to the Netherlands' capital. Release your inner rocker by hiring a guitar, taste fame at Bar Americain and Café Americain, turn heads on the hotel’s private jetty, find your zen to a custom DJ-curated soundtrack with complimentary in-room yoga classes and much more.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages/nights)**

- Arrive refreshed with a **welcome drink** 
- **Upgrade to the next room category**, subject to availability (excludes Rock Royalty Rooms and Junior Suites)
- Wake up to **daily à la carte breakfast** at Café Americain (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Get the VIP treatment you deserve with complimentary **access to the Rock Royalty Lounge**, including courtesy bar with beer, wine and soft drinks, daily breakfast, high tea and evening snacks, plus private check-in/checkout and Sound of Your Stay® amenities such as personalised Tracks® playlists, Wax® Crossley record player and Picks® guitar rentals (for stays of 5+ nights)

**Rock Royalty Upgrade**: The ultimate upgrade for music lovers. Escape the limelight and recharge your batteries in a spacious Rock Royalty Room with access to the Rock Royalty Lounge and Sound of Your Stay® amenities such as personalised Tracks® playlists, Wax® Crossley record player and Picks® guitar rentals

title: Contemporary City Stay Near Johan Cruijff Arena
description: There are few things more Dutch than great design; experience it with a stay at Holiday Inn Amsterdam - Arena Towers, an IHG Hotel. Amsterdam is swelling with culture, with great artists such as Van Gogh and Rembrandt once calling this canal-woven city home. Visit the Rijksmuseum and bask in history’s masterpieces and spend a day roaring in the stands of the Johan Cruijff Arena. Live like a local and bike around to admire the age-old facades, or take in the sights on foot.
location_description: Holiday Inn Amsterdam - Arena Towers, an IHG Hotel

title: Heritage Amsterdam Riverfront Luxury with Indoor Pool & Sauna
description: It's easy to believe you've stepped back in time when you stay at the InterContinental Amstel Amsterdam, an IHG Hotel, located along the city's famous canals. Discover original heritage features, from 19th-century staircases to crystal chandeliers and polished marble floors. Be treated to gourmet delights with afternoon tea at the glass-enclosed Amstel Lounge, sip classic cocktails with a twist at the bar, and make use of the large indoor pool and steamy sauna at the Health Club.
location_description: Intercontinental Amstel Amsterdam, an IHG Hotel

title: Boutique-Style Amsterdam Luxury with Ultra-Cool Cocktail Bar
description: Stay among the charming canals and whizzing bicycles of Amsterdam at Kimpton De Witt Hotel, a sophisticated hotel in the heart of the city. While you're here, dine at Celia, a modern American restaurant with a touch of Californian flavours found in its menu. For a tipple or two amid ultra-cool surroundings, Super Lyan is a casual cocktail bar with the works: a central circular bar, neon purple lighting and red leather booths - not to mention expertly shaken cocktails by resident mixologists.
offer_address: Nieuwezijds Voorburgwal 5, 1012 RC Amsterdam, The Netherlands

title: Five-Star Japanese Luxury in Amsterdam's De Pijp Neighbourhood with Michelin-Star Restaurants
description: Exquisite five-star Japanese hospitality has made its way to Amserdam's stunning De Pijp neighbourhood at Hotel Okura Amsterdam. As a member of The Leading Hotels of the World, you can expect nothing but the finest, with five outstanding restaurants with three Michelin stars between them. When you aren't gazing out onto the shimmering Amsterdam skyline, retreat to the world-class Nagomi Spa, swimming pool or fitness centre for ultimate relaxation.
offer_address: Ferdinand Bolstraat 333, 1072 LH Amsterdam, The Netherlands

title: Central Amsterdam Architectural Marvel in the Museum Quarter with Onsite Dining & Spa
description: This 19th-century former bank and music school has been reborn into one of Amsterdam's most fashionable stays. Sample cocktails and nibbles from Barbounia's Meditteranean menu in the glass-enclosed central atrium - an architectural marvel known locally as 'Amsterdam's Living Room.' Dine at Taiko, a contemporary Japanese-Western fusion restaurant, and melt away at Akasha Spa & Gym. With a location between The Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, Stedelijk Museum and Amsterdam's premier high-end shopping strip, Amsterdam's spoils are all within easy reach.

title: Design-Led Boutique Escape in Hip Amsterdam De Pijp District
description:
A former diamond factory now dazzles as the home of Sir Albert Hotel, a sophisticated and stylish oasis in the heart of Amsterdam. The hotel’s iconic redbrick façade is a gem in the De Pijp district’s crown, with a 19th-century splendour that delights guests and visitors alike. 

Surrounded by some of the city’s best foodie finds and a hop, skip and a jump from the famous Albert Cuyp Markt street market, it is perfectly placed for soaking up the culture and exploring the canals of the Dutch city. Behind the historical front doors, escape to The Study for a drink by the fireplace, or head to the culinary hotspot Izakaya Kitchen & Bar. End each day in one of the bright and airy rooms, complete with contemporary design and luxurious touches, while considered workspaces will make reading emails enjoyable.

title: Creative Central Amsterdam Boutique Stay in Restored 17th & 18th Century Houses
description: For lovers of the finer things in life, experience Dutch luxury and a sprinkling of creativity with a five-star stay at Pulitzer Amsterdam. Spanning 25 restored 17th- and 18th-century homes, this site claims an enviable spot along Amsterdam's canals with the city’s love of the arts splashed throughout its interiors. Sample expertly crafted dishes in Pulitzer’s Garden or Jansz. and refresh the palate with a delicious cocktail at the cosy Pulitzer’s Bar.

title: Amsterdam Urban Retreat with Iconic Canal Views
description: Fall in love with eye-catching Dutch Baroque architecture, lose yourself in the lively atmosphere and cycle along iconic canals with a stay at Crowne Plaza Amsterdam - South, an IHG Hotel. Dine on sumptuous cuisine with waterfront views at the hotel's signature restaurant Happyhappyjoyjoy Zudias, refresh at the onsite fitness centre or toast to your stay at Manhattan Lounge bar. When it's time to explore, heritage attractions, vibrant cafes, bars and restaurants are all within close reach.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Amsterdam - South, an IHG Hotel
